name: Blue Block the Alien
description:
Blue Block the Alien is a retro style platformer that has you going through different levels and biomes.

The story goes that you are an alien flying through space but for some "unknown" reason (probably just a crap pilot) he crashed down to a mysterious planet. Just before he crashed the GPS system on his ship said there is a space ship launch site just a few miles away, what I mean by that is:

Going through an overworld with a piss-taking bird that won't stop crapping on you.

Then through the depths of hell where you fight an off-brand satin.

Then through a Forrest with a stupid fly that wants your life for some reason!
